meta_description: Discover the vibrant community at Climate Tech Connect. Connect with like-minded individuals, participate in events, and join our mission to innovate in climate technology.

feature1.title: strategic introductions
feature1.description: get introductions with strategic partners carefully matched with your current needs

feature2.title: curated experiences
feature2.description: join exclusive events with top speakers & only the most relevant topics, crafted for the specific target group

feature3.title: collective wisdom
feature3.description: leverage on the community's collective knowledge & support, get invaluable insight of each others' experiences & challenges

feature4.title: expert access & advisory
feature4.description: get easy connections with subject-matter experts on the most burning topics

block1.title: Why join?
block1.description: We believe the real world value can be created through high quality social ties & relationships.

block2.title: Why we do it
block2.description:
Using our network and strategic support, we want to propel growth of the most innovative climate tech Benelux companies, help them secure consistent, sustainable capital, access community & knowledge.

We see sustainability as a call to action & want to make it easier for those who actively strive towards building a more regenerative lifestyle, a better world.

Science shows that community and a sense of belonging can boost our cognitive functions & emotional intelligence, and shape us into more empathetic beings; we can use this human programming to collectively expand our knowledge and awaraness, and ultimately - drive real world change.

steps.label: Fill in a simple form & choose membership
We evaluate your inquiry & confirm via email
You're in the database & can now receive access to events
